RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: Additional File Format Import Support
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description:
Import various external file format samples and instruments from the Renoise disk browser.
Currently supported sample formats: * Akai MPC2000/2000XL (.snd) * Akai S1000/S3000 (.s) * Korg Trinity/Triton (.ksf) * Propellerheads Recycle (.rex)
Currently supported instrument formats: * Akai MPC1000 Programs (.pgm) * Akai MPC2000/2000XL Programs (.pgm) * Akai S1000 Programs (.p) * Akai S5000/S6000/Z4/Z8 Programs (.akp) * Apple/EMagic Logic EXS24 Patches (.exs) * Korg Trinity/Triton Multisamples (.kmp) * Korg Trinity/Triton Peformance Scripts (.ksc) * Propellerheads Reason NN-XT Patches (.sxt) [partial] * Roland MV8x000 Patches (.mv0) [samples only] * rgc:audio 'SFZ' Patches (.sfz)
RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: Martin Bealby | mxb (mbealby@gmail.com)
